attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252681. This is a great Crossover vehicle that is still in very good condition and has room to put a lot more kms on the clock.
It has a turbo engine that performs well, is nippy in traffic and goes well on the highway. It handles well, is as easy to park as a hatch back and has a comfortable driving position. It is a reliable vehicle that is light on fuel.
Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
Please note that the advertised price does not include admin fees of R8500 which will be charged on all vehicles sold.

attributes.description:
If you are looking for a quality Pre-Owned Vehicle then look no further.  
Book a test drive today to experience this vehicle.  Delivery can be arranged nationwide. Price excludes admin and delivery fee. Finance can be arranged on premises and trade- ins are welcome.
We at Wingfield Motors Bellville strive for perfection, so that you as the customer can make the most of each moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect vehicle to suit your needs so please do take a stroll on our showroom floor. 
We give you peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a stringent Check List.  
You are welcome to speak to one of our Finance consultants for a tailored financial package to suite your needs or one of our Sales Executives, to help with all your vehicle requirements.

attributes.description:
Motus TOYOTA Nelspruit offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very
own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership
or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come
with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is
101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price
advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard
price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome
